entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear late this evening then partly cloudy with flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
